page.title: 02DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: Below High Valleyfield is the small village of{Low Valleyfield}_ mainly residential,some new houses,some old. Here too the S.S.E.B. are in the process of a large{land reclamation project,using waste fly ash from Longannet Power Station to reclaim land to as far out as Preston Island. This is a large scale project which will result in landscaped land,planted with thousands of trees. Along the coast,to the east,are the villages of{Newmills}and {Torryburn,}virtually running together. They are quiet villages with very few amenities.The children in these two villages attend Torryburn Primary School, which also has Nursery facilities.
